website_summaries.verdict: With fewer issues than its competitors and ample space and convenient features, the model 45-0592 tops our list.
pros: A large unit with impressive 25 cubic ft. flow-through hopper
Grabs even small pieces of debris
Height adjusts easily with the push of a button
Folds to a compact size for convenient storage
cons: A few complaints of missing parts upon arrival
Somewhat difficult to control in reverse

customer_reviews.title: Poorly crafted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at the same time as my Agri-Fab Dethatcher (Agri-Fab 45-0343 Tine Dethatcher for all tow lawn sweepers — which also had manufacturing defects). The sweeper had holes that didn't line up, so I had to drill them out myself to fit the piece through them. Also, 2 nesting poles did not fit until I re-shaped them with a vice. My experience with Agri-Fab — while limited as I've only purchased 2 items — is that the products are not given proper quality control and are sloppily manufactured. I would only suggest purchasing if you have the tools and patience to fix items prior to using them.
customer_reviews.author: Camm

customer_reviews.title: Disposable sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. It’s mostly held together with buttons and velcro. After the first few uses it’s torn and the fabric has broken off most of the buttons and the velcro isnt holding anything. After 3 or 4 uses the frame has badly bent. The sweeper itself works ok but I doubt it will last through this fall’ss clean up. I expect more from this manufacturer, especially for the price they are charging for this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kane Turmelle

customer_reviews.title: Best Lawn Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that some of the reviews said that this doesn't last. They are wrong. I got mine in 2015 and now into my 4th season and it is still going strong. I have a large 3 acre yard with numerous trees. It is probably used once a week during the peak grass season and probably 40 or more loads of leaves every Fall. I only had one problem when my wife Jackknifed the sweeper and broke one of the wheels. A quick visit to the Agri-Fab website to find a part and I was back to work in no time. I would buy again and would also recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peplin

customer_reviews.title: Better a few years ago - my second purchase
customer_reviews.text: Why would they change the spring loaded height adjustment knob? It made it so easy when changing heights. Now you have to deal with a cheap pin and clip assembly that you have to line up. Also the multi-height hitch setup is understood but I can easily see how many people will never do that correctly. At least print a ruler along the side of the assembly page for the hitch to make it simpler. An easy improvement. Worked well on its first run but as I said a pain to change heights or put in transport mode compared to the prior product which I sold before I moved 3 years ago. Wish I still had it.
customer_reviews.author: thekingdom

customer_reviews.title: Sweeper is good but platic gears and wheels are no good
customer_reviews.text: This is second one.Plastic gear and plastic wheels broke again.We do not need another sweeper.We need some metal gears and wheels for the one we have.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie simpson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and missing an essential part
customer_reviews.text: Good news: it arrived a day earlier than expected. Bad news: it is clearly a used product and came missing one of the essential (as in can’t run to the hardware store to replace) items. You can see the scratches on several pieces in the pictures. I paid for a new product with all of its parts. Unlike some websites, there is no easy button to click to request replacement parts. Unfortunately, my husband was over-eager with clearing out the box and already threw it and the packaging out. Now I have to try to get a replacement part before I can even try to put the thing together. I wish I’d gone to local store this time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing (edited) - “OK”
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with one weld broken, won’t be able to use it until that is fixed because it twists without the weld. Directions were pictures only and slightly confusing. I had to remove nearly every pin after I figured out that the direction they were installed affected how the catch bag would be protected from the pins. Will update after I fix the weld. Pretty disappointing for the price paid. Edited - I welded the brace back on and tried the rake, it actually works pretty well. A little obnoxious to dump but it picked up nearly every leaf. Still only three stars since I had to repair it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H

customer_reviews.title: Built tough, shipped damaged but functional
customer_reviews.text: Great product, built strong and does a real nice job with leaves and grass. Stores away pretty small for a bulky lawn tool. Just a heads up. This showed up on my porch rough! It’s heavy and the box it ships in was destroyed. I crossed my fingers all the piece were there, and they were. I posted a pic of the large dent, had to bang that back. Not sure where the blame sits, still gave it 5 stars. It going to get beat up anyways, some spots started sooner thanks to USPS.
customer_reviews.author: MastercraftX2

customer_reviews.title: Works Very a Well!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2.5 acres and a lot of trees and leaves. I pull this behind my Cub Cadet lawn tractor. I cannot imagine raking by hand after using this. The hopper is pretty big, but I still got 20 loads the first usage. Dumping is easy and is done while seated on the tractor. Assembly was straight forward and did require 2 people for some of the steps. I considered buying a bagger, a mulch kit, and this option. This was the best choice for handling my leaves. I recommend this for large yards with a lot of leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C. Harry

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I use this mostly to pick up dog poop in my yard before I have a party and it works great! Seems to be very durable. I read a lot about these types of sweepers before I bought this one and I read a lot of reviews that talked about gears stripping and brushes breaking. I slam this puppy as far down as I can get it, crank the o'l John Deere up into the rabbit section and put my foot through the floor. This one has not broke yet! Very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: JP355

customer_reviews.title: Sweeper came damaged from factory
customer_reviews.text: This is the highly rated 44 inch model, however this sweeper was damaged. Main support tube was bent and wheels and height adjustment jammed. Agri-Fab is sending replacement parts but I have already spent 4 hours disassembling the sweeper. If yours arrives damaged return to Amazon. Also various minor dents and bends in the sheet metal and paint nix. The shipping box is very thin for the size of the sweeper. Open the box carefully so you can reuse it if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Archer Sr.

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must have! Can't wait for Fall!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this thing years ago! By far, this is the best model I could have bought from Agri-Fab. Simple to set up and worked amazingly well. I just mowed 10" of white, tough clover in my yard and it was a mess. This sweep picked up 100% of the clippings! Even the ones I drove over. My yard is an acre and I swept it completely in 2 hours! This included dumping and going back and getting the places that I missed by accident!
customer_reviews.author: Barry G. Turner

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY SWEEPER, WORKS GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I expected a couple of passes to pick up heavy grass. I was wrong. This thing rocks. One pass to pick up light to very heavy grass clippings. Picks up dry to very wet grass. No problem. Only recommendation, if the grass is wet, empty bin at half full or it will be very very heavy. Haven't tried leaves. In short, I love this sweeper. Easy to assemble, well made, meets and exceeds all claims, easy to break down to reduce size for storage. I would buy this sweeper again and highly recommend it to others. SOOO EASY to make your lawn look wonderful without the backbreaking work of raking.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweeper!
customer_reviews.text: Had been shopping for a lawn sweeper for over a yr. This one had good reviews and the fact we didn't have to mess with the headache of loading and transporting was enough to give this sweeper a try. Plus, it was cheaper and better quality than ones we were looking at.....at home depot, or lowes. My husband easily put together, and we can report it works great! Was so incredibly tired of raking leaves can't believe we waited so long to buy this wonderful lawn tool!
customer_reviews.author: zinger

customer_reviews.title: Get the older version!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This is for the newer model, 45-04922. The bag arms for this model have been shortened. This makes the bag pivot too close to the sweeper when dumping, causing leaves to pile up on top and not properly clear. Very frustrating having to get off tractor and manually clear leaves/grass every time you dump. The older model which a neighbor has is 45-04921. The old version has the longer bag arms and dumps like a champ. Get the older version or you’ll hate this sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Paisley

customer_reviews.title: The most interesting purchase from Amazon, ever.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good unit, though when it arrived it was missing one part and another part was bent/crushed on one end. Appeared the box had been resealed so I suspect this was someone's return. (When I called in to have the missing and broken parts replaced I was told I would have to accept an "entire" new unit. This seemed like a waste of time and money but was told that is the policy. When that replacement unit arrived it was a true experience. Damage beyond belief. Must admit that the damaged and missing parts I needed were in this box, however). Have only used it once since I got it assembled and it seems OK.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit of a challenge to assemble, being without instructions (at least mine was), I just looked at the photo and kind of fit it together...only a couple re-do's on some parts. It fills up pretty fast, but it does a great job sweeping! Easy to empty and store. The one thing I do not like is there is not way to temporarily raise raise the brushes to clear an obstacle; like having to cross a gravel driveway - prepare to have rocks in your compost!!
customer_reviews.author: PJDSR

customer_reviews.title: I Like It.
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting one of these for a long time. Just using it to sweep the lawn to keep it clean, but Autumn is soon upon us and I have a bunch of oak trees ready to dump their leaves. It has already been a banner year for acorns and this has really helped clean those up. This is going to save me a ton of work and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍👎
customer_reviews.text: I found it easy to assemble. I used it one time and it picked up wonderfully. But the bag ripped along bottom seam. Very disappointed, spent a lot of money on something I can’t use after one time. Wish the bag was built better.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wishing I didn't need this
customer_reviews.text: Just finished unboxing, and if I didn't absolutely need this to clean up my yard because of the hayfield that it has become, I would send it back. Poor shipping box, hardly any shipping foam and multiple bends, dents, and scrapes right out of the box. For over 300 dollars consumers deserve better. I hope it performs as advertised but if you're thinking about buying this I would say avoid Amazon shipping it and check one out at a retail store so it isn't destroyed before it gets to you.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: my neck hurts
customer_reviews.text: We are currently trying to figure out how to get rid of this thing. We bought it to replace a craftsman lawn sweeper. Our propery has quite an incline which was not an issue with the craftsman. This one you have to constantly keep your head turned around to see if you are picking anything up. It is far less effective and efficient than other lawn sweepers we have had.
customer_reviews.author: margo tardif

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a major Godsend! We have seven acres, and a LOT of mature hardwood trees that have been giving us fits every fall trying to deal with all those leaves. Now that we are in our sixties, it isn't easy on our backs to do all that raking - not to mention the enormous amount of time it took up. Put this together and used it for the first time the other day. Unbelievable! Where have you been all my life? Wish we would have ordered this years ago! Highly recommend to anyone who has a large property and a ginormous amount of leaves. Thank you Agri-Fab and Amazon.!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the grass sweeper. It seems fairly well built and worked well on my grass and leaves.. I love assembling things and it was fairly easy, or at least most of it. My biggest gripe is that I had to disassemble part of it to get it to store in a reasonably sized space. Due to that I will not use it as often, as who wants to store a jumbo item or to have to put it back together every time you use it? But it dose work.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packed, Damaged Cosmetically
customer_reviews.text: Presentation and function to date = 5 star, Packaging = 1 star; not meant for individual shipment without pallet. Product dented causing paint to chip but did not impact function. Packing material did not hold item secure and box was not damaged. Item should come with a touchup paint to fix or at least a paint code/part number. Some parts (retaining pins) are not as heavy as I would like. I would say overall happy with function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The plastic gear teeth on the wheels will strip and fail you
customer_reviews.text: This is the second season for this lawn sweeper. Last year I was impressed – not this year however. I am convinced that everyone will have to replace their wheels fairly quickly - Agrifab part 40987. You can look up on Amazon and see customers comments. The gears on the wheel are plastic teeth – you will see this when you put it together. The gear that the wheel engages (the brushes) is steel. It’s simply setup to fail over time – I used mine about 8 times before the gears finally wore down enough that the brushes stopped turning. Regardless of the good reviews – the plastic gears “will” strip out on you.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D

customer_reviews.title: Really great sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the instructions indicate 5 mph towing max. Not a problem for me, my tractor doesn't go much faster than that. Sweeps very well when following setup instructions. Set up for lawn sweeping or transport is very easy, a few seconds and you are ready to go. Sweeps very well. Love this thing. Real labor saver.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Sombra

customer_reviews.title: It's not to difficult to build like others say but after two uses I'm already missing ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's not worth it. It's not to difficult to build like others say but after two uses I'm already missing pins that Iv had to replace with key rings. It's not gonna solve all your leaf problems but if you now over them first and chop them up it collects them better than whole as the bag fills up in no time. Too expensive for the quality but couldn't really find a alternative that wasn't the same. Not easy to unload as it's a complete Bitch to reverse. Had I tried it before I bought it I wouldn't have spent this amount of money on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect model shipped
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what the difference is between models, however I ordered the 45-0492 and received the 45-04921. Unfortunately I only noticed the difference after I assembled the unit. With that said, I have used the sweeper once and it seems to work well. The assembly was straightforward. It seemed to pick up grass clipping, pine straw and cones. I will see how well it picks up leaves this fall.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, used a few times and the brushes stopped spinning. Took wheels off and realized the plastic gears in both wheels had ground off completely. I purchased two replacement wheels and made sure to follow instructions of driving very slow and not having it set too low. I just went out to use it for the third time since I replaced the wheels and they are stripped again. What a waste of money/time/space in my shed. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bethman

customer_reviews.title: The best way to rake leaves and more
customer_reviews.text: We have 2.5 acres with literally scores of trees. I used to 'rake' leaves using a bagging lawnmower but it was dirty, dusty and I had to get on and off the mower frequently to dump the relatively small bags. Now I drive around the yard pulling my sweeper (actually my second of this model, the 10-year old predecessor finally gave out) sweeping leaves, twigs, acorns, and all manner of small debris easily. I still have to get off the mower to dump, but not as often as the old bagging method. And the lawn looks like you swept it with a broom. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: George E Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for an inexpensive solution.
customer_reviews.text: I have a one acre lot with a number of various trees from oak to maple. I tow it with a John Deere e140 rider and zip around with no problem. The brush adjustments make the work easy and comes up clean. 1 inch Acorns from my tree get picked with ease. One design flaw; I have caught the front lip on a root. Reinforced lip would avoid cotly mistakes. Fill, empty, repeat. For an inexpensive solution not a bad choice. Disassemble for storage and keep it clean and it feels like it will last for years. Good build.
customer_reviews.author: Dcn Marcelino

customer_reviews.title: Wheel gears are inadequate material
customer_reviews.text: The gears on the wheels are plastic and the gears on the sweeper housing are metal. The 2 don’t go together well and the plastic wheel gears rubbed off first time out. Can’t use anymore
customer_reviews.author: chad gassman

customer_reviews.title: WHY Rake.... SWEEP it!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I waited this long to acquire one of these. After checking the "ratings" of the various sweepers on the market... WE decided to purchase the Agri-Fab 44" sweeper. Shipped quickly from vender, arrived safely thanks to UPS.. and assembled within an hour complete. Instructions so simple, even a two-year old could have done it. Attached it to my rider (after mowing), and easily cleaned-up over an acre's worth of area before needing to dump it. MY Lawn, looks better than some golf-courses now!! FANTASTIC!! Thank You, AGRI-FAB for making such an outstanding product!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Branstad

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper, big yard and leaves? It’s a must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a decent sized yard and leaves needs to buy this. It’s the best yard accessory I have ever purchased. I have 4 stars for durability only because the bar the the handle attaches to, to dump the leaves is bent. Aside from that, I can clear about an acre an hour with this sweeper. A MUST BUY if you have a lot of leaves and a larger yard. I cannot recommend it’s enough!
customer_reviews.author: James Hughes

customer_reviews.title: A Good Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This lawn sweeper works as advertised. I took care to make the tow shaft level when hooking it up and also took care to adjust the brush height to give the proper overlap on the grass (the instructions recommend 1/2"). It sweeps well, both cut grass and leaves. If the leaves or grass you pick up are dry it is very easy to dump one-handed without leaving the tractor seat. However if the leaves are wet it might require using both hands (I was still able to remain in the seat).
customer_reviews.author: Photoangler

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to sweep up leaves like magic.
customer_reviews.text: I got this put together without much trouble after I dug out the baked in plastic on the first connector. I found a video made by an owner that helped a lot with what to expect from operating it. It isn't the magic lawn sweeper I had hoped it would be. It seems to leave a lot behind. I have to stop fairly often and push the leaves back so more will go in. I sort of think it might be easier to just mow the leaves and pine needles up into rows, pick them up with a rake and use the sweeper to haul them to a dump site. I've used it on leaves, pine needles, and grass clippings.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Tube Frame is Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. This is the 5th time I’ve used it and it’s broken. It’s a tube frame that holds the netting in and where the handle connects it has snapped. I’ve been very careful about not maxing our the capacity of the netting. There is not other way to pull up on the sweeper to dump the clippings and it has snapped. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, matches husqvarna paint perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is easy and takes half hour or so. So far seems to be working just fine. The pole for lifting the basket for dumping was bent from shipping but no big deal works as it should. The only gripe I had is the front of the sweeper sits a bit too low for comfort and snagged on the ground on a slight grade. Made some modifications to the hitch and it seems to be better. Looks to be of good quality, time will tell. As a plus, the color scheme matches my husqvarna mower perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cast

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Although box was slightly open, everything was still there. Really good quality and great "simple" directions. Although I got 2 sets of 2 screws intertwined, I realized I needed to separate the screws using 1 at a time. Works just as described. Sure is nice to find something that works!
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Product works great, especially with pine cones and walnuts
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, especially with pine cones and walnuts. I pull it with a small JD 2520 tractor, so the dumping process is not as smooth as if I were on a lawnmower but the product works great. Not much fun to assemble but we managed without too much hassle. I used it three times before backing over one of the wheels and breaking it. Was super easy to order replacement parts from the company website. Has good documentation and parts lists what come with the instructions. Keep that forever as it’s much easier to reference than the online materials from the manufacturer. Fast parts delivery and luckily an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: R. Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Very Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The welds weren't in the correct spot which means the pin holes weren't lined up properly. I had to drill the holes out in order to get the pins to fit though. The entire package comes with 2 bolts and 2 nuts and the nuts don't even fit! They provided nuts smaller than the bolts. How do you mess that up? There are only 2! The assembly instructions are nothing but badly drawn pictures. The pictures aren't even an accurate representation of what needs to be done to assemble it properly. I don't know how it will function, but the assembly process for this makes it not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: koria

customer_reviews.title: Emptying is a pain
customer_reviews.text: You can't simply empty with handle while on your mower. So you have to get off and dump it. Which was frustrating as it didnt dump out easily. We learned that its easier to remove the basket completely empty it and put back on. That was the simplest way. Not sure I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper. Good on pine needles!
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper is awesome! Used it for the 1st time today (10/14/16) and I'm glad I got it! The height adjustment takes a few tries to get it where you want it, but after that it's a breeze! Even picked up the massive amount of pine needles that came down. My only complaints are: 1) The instructions were pictures only. If you're slightly mechanically inclined, it's easy to figure out. 2) The handle to dump the hopper could be a bit longer. It's a slight reach to get it from my mower seat (John Deere D140) Other than that, it's a great product. And Made in U.S.A. to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Bobs stuff

customer_reviews.title: This is the hot ticket !!!
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it says it does. Works great, I can't tell you how much work it has saved us. We have 60 trees on our acre and all but one loses their leaves ! This year we had an early hard freeze, all the leaves turned brown and fell off at the same time, the lawn sweeper had no problem picking them up. This is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lazybug

customer_reviews.title: WHEEL INTERNAL GEAR FAILURE
customer_reviews.text: I had the sweeper for three months and used it approximately nine times sweeping my < one acre lawn. Then it failed by stripping the plastic gears inside the wheels. After taking it apart and seeing the internal plastic gears, I'm amazed that Agri-Fab would think that this design is acceptable for a large capacity sweeper meant to be towed behind an ATV or lawn tractor. With the exception of this flaw, this is really an excellent sweeper, but until this design defect is corrected, I cannot recommend this sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY A. HEACOX

customer_reviews.title: Saving Time on raking leaves
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new lawn sweeper. It was easy to assemble. We have a large lot with lots of trees. It took only one hour to sweep up all the leaves. In combination with a new leaf mulcher, we cleaned, mulched and bagged all of the leaves in just two hours. What a time saver and physical break for a senior citizen.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Orwig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lawn sweeper for grass clippings and small yard debri.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd yard sweeper. The 1st lasted many years, but ... Besides that this does an excellent job of picking things up, what I most appreciate is how easy the height is to adjust for both the height of the yard tractor I use to pull it and for the varying heights of ground I'm sweeping: driveway and varying grass heights. SIMPLE. It appears very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Camasman

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in this product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product for the price. Why have an easy dump handle when you have to get off the mower to raise the brushes so you can drive across the driveway to dump the trailer. It picks up the gravel nicely. The catcher is plastic and one corner wasn't even sewn I don't see this lasting very long. We had a canvas one that lasted over 10 years. I would check to see if you can find one that the brushes adjust easy or you can stop so you don't have to get on and off the mower to dump the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this hard to assemble, took about 30 minutes. I pull it behind a Troy Bilt Bronco. It picks up leaves, pine needles, pine cones and small sticks in the yard just fine. Easy to dump while seated on the tractor. I have used it a couple times with no issues. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is big!
customer_reviews.text: Only used once but so far seems to works well. Not difficult to put together. Seems sturdy. Once I had the brushes at the right height picked up the grass and other yard debris. Lawn looks better for it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great grass collector!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 acre yard and this has worked very well for removing unwanted grass clippings. I was surprised that I only needed to empty it 3-4 times each mowing. I am not a very big girl and I was concerned whether it would be difficult for me to empty but it definitely is not. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie klinger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to use; but shipping box was terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent to use; I use this after mowing my small half acre lawn and it makes my clean up so much faster than before. Negative: When I received the shipping box, the product was a disaster. Some of the items were bent, and a major bend on the cage. I am disappointed the shipping wasn't more professional. It appeared to me as though I received a package that was pulled together from parts that had previously been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Sweeper OK for large level open lawns
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sweeps a large area, eliminating raking most of the lawn. Cons: Somewhat difficult to assemble - cannot control direction in reverse, making it impossible to back up to curb to dump - very difficult to reach back to pull handle: to dump, and restore handle to continue - when bag is mostly full, unit drags along some of leaves just dumped - only the basket folds; difficult to store large heavy unit - must rake/blow or vacuum perimeter of yard due to large width of unit not capable of navigating around or near trees. Needed to supplement with hand-held leaf blower/vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Similar to my previous model
customer_reviews.text: The instructions leave a little to be desired, but workable. The final two "locking nuts" were the wrong size -- had to use lock washer and other spare nuts from my "junk box" to finish the assembly. Functions well and well made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Made friends with the neighbors
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. This. And so do the neighbors. After reading the reviews, I drive gently with it so as not to destroy the drives. That being said, this thing swept up our leaves like nothin'. The height adjustment is easy enough, just might have to tailor it to the exact height of your grass. After doing my lawn, I drove across the street and did the neighbor's yard too. The 12-pack that was on my front doorstep the next day says it all... Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper - worth every penney!
customer_reviews.text: We have a large yard and it is too big to rake the grass after it is cut. The leaf bags cost way too much so we decided to try this lawn sweeper. It works great and is easy to empty also. Well worth the price and not too hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia True

customer_reviews.title: The lawn sweeper I received contained the wrong hitch. ...
customer_reviews.text: The lawn sweeper I received contained the wrong hitch. A cheaper hitch design was included instead of the advertised hitch (part #67664). The well designed advertised hitch was part of the reason I bought this sweeper. Returning the entire sweeper is not an option as the sweeper is over 90lb. and you won't know the hitch is the wrong one until you have cut up the box and partially assembled the sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: Smokin' Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fragile. Only for small manicured lawns.
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight to do what it is designed to do. The basket frame broke and bent multiple times before the repairs beefed it. Mine finally died beyond repair when the plastic wheels stripped their gears. Lasted two years of part time use on a large treed lawn.
customer_reviews.author: George Hayduke

customer_reviews.title: read the directions a few times , as the pictures are a little confusing...
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the directions, but got it together fairly easily. Works beautifully! Will sweep up grass, leaves and small sticks. Weather has been preventing me from mowing when I need to, but with this sweeper you'd never know it. All those grass clippings are no longer making my lawn look messy.
customer_reviews.author: LaRoy Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten to use this item about 3 times. The first two times I was very impressed. Easy to dump, picks up grass and leaves nicely. The third use however, the brush snapped off and got got stuck while I was mowing. I quickly noticed but it was too late. The brush was bent and ruined. Now my machine only picks up from one side because the brush on the other side snapped off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Pickes up everything.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lawn sweeper. For the last 15 years I had an older Agrifab lawn sweeper that I reconditioned (yes parts are still available) and gave to my daughter. I bought this because of the reliability of my older sweeper. After sweeping 1.5 acres, I must say that I am not disappointed. This picks up everything (sticks, rocks, even pine needles) plus its heavy enough not to bounce and miss items. I highly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Don S

customer_reviews.title: Worst directions ever.
customer_reviews.text: This review has nothing to do with the performance of the sweeper because the packaging was missing part #35( two springs) and will take a week to get them. For those of us that are mechanically challenged the direction were basically gibberish. There are no written instructions only pictures that IMO are very poorly illustrated. Any company that can not provide better directions than these will no longer be getting my business.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Newbottle

customer_reviews.title: Agri-Fab Lawn Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5, but at my age trying to unload the contents while driving the tractor is difficult. It really does an excellent job of picking up grass and leaves. It is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: dajku

customer_reviews.title: and I've found it to be a great yard tool
customer_reviews.text: I've used this 4 times so far, and I've found it to be a great yard tool. It does everything for me that the other reviewers have claimed that it does. I would love to be able to disengage the sweeper (vs. raising the height to the highest level) without getting off of the tractor so that it will not try to sweep up things that I don't want to sweep up as I'm towing a full load to be dumped in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: P Boot

customer_reviews.title: Much Easier than Raking!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy assembly and adjustment. Clips make it very easy to break down for storage. Good leaf pick-up. Fantastic purchase. Should have purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Stan57Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Quality and customer service fail
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are horrible, no words only pictures. The kit has two bolts and two nuts to assemble the hitch and to my surprise they were not the correct size. Customer service is a huge disappointment. Only offered to send new bolts and nuts. Just purchased $600 on 3 items and the 1st item can’t be completed. Declined to wait 4 days for bolts in mail when can purchase myself. Just bad attention to detail and bad customer service, may just return the other 2 agri -fab items and go with different manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Durable lawn sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This lawn sweeper is quality build. It is very sturdy and easy to operate. You can adjust the height of the brushes on the side. We have used it all summer to pick up grass clippings and had no issues. It makes your lawn look so much better and cleaner. Each cut looks professional and neat. Would definitely recommend. Also it matches our tractor. Very nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Please with performance - time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Did a nice job - pine needles were not an issue - quality is better then the other lines I looked at for the price range - like most reviews you receive the request prior to a lot of use so time will tell - Agri-Fab customer service is five stars - upon assembly I noticed the stiching on the bag had missed the lower velcro seam - customer service immediately sent another bag - assembly was very easy - the unit allows for quick break down for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job for grass clippings
customer_reviews.text: Nice well bilt. I mainly use it for lawn clippings. I tow behind my lawn mower tractor. Its critical to set the sweeper to the right level. It needs to just touch the grass. If you set the brush too low it will just drag on the ground. It will not pick up wet grass also. I usaly have to go over few passes before most of the clippings will be picked up. Don't expect it to pick up 100% of the clippings. Overall its better than a bager for your lawnmor.
customer_reviews.author: Greencop

customer_reviews.title: Not my first Agrifab product...
customer_reviews.text: Have a spreader too. This thing works like a champ and even came with all the correct parts this time. The spreader that I bought first did not..... But take a chance. I made a Mountain of leaves with this in no time. Consider mowing them first and then collecting to save some space... hahha. Would recommend. This was one seasons worth of data...
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of positive and negative reviews. The instructions were not that difficult. Just a bunch of pictures. Went together in about 20 minutes. One of the wheels was loose in the box but I found all of the parts to replace it except the "hubcap". I am not going to worry about it. Picks up grass great. I will admit that I have only used it one time but I cannot complain. The jury is out on all of the pins and clips that it uses for its construction. If they start falling out as many have commented on I will just install traditional bolts and nylock nuts. Good value for $300 and change.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps Great.  Problems with Some Parts.
customer_reviews.text: Sweeper works great but there are a few engineering flaws that are frustrating. The metal rods used to hold up the back of the catcher easily fall out when unloading. Have lost two and had to fabricate new ones. I bought this to replace the exact same model I purchased three years ago. The axle that the sweeper brushes are attached to broke in half due to metal fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Improvements
customer_reviews.text: I have an Agri-Fab 32" sweeper that I purchased over 25 years ago. It still works and does a decent job but I wanted a newer one that was a little larger and had the ability to be pulled offset instead of directly behind the lawn tractor. Enabling pick up as you mow. The new design is a pleasant surprise . The tow bar can fold out of the way as well as the hopper arms and the hopper can collapse. All making a much smaller footprint, when storing, than my older , smaller unit.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: AN ABSOLUTE TIMESAVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely FANTASTIC product! I was able to completely sweep a 1 acre yard in an hour! No more blisters or breaking my back with a rake!!! Took approximately 1 hour to assemble. Instructions were fine. Construction of metal is good and is not flimsey when pulling with mower. The emptying handle is awesome! Excellent product and was shipped/received ahead of schedule by 1 day. Great overall transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Randall K. Dutkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Obviously wasn't tested at factory
customer_reviews.text: Good sweeper but doesn't dump at all. Every time you go to dump it the load gets tightly packed and will not come out of the hopper. So aggravating and absolutely worthless to own you might as well rake your own grass or leaves. Would not recommend you buy this item
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Grass piles killing the lawn... what grass piles?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Really well built. Last summer was very wet. Grass got ahead of me. Ended up just mowing and moving grass clippings. Hooked this up to my lawn tractor and it created a reverse waterfall of grass that formed a solid arc of clippings going into the hopper. Really easy to empty. My lawn is about 3-4 acres. Got all the new and old clippings up and dumped in an hour and a half. I love anything that is simple, well designed and keeps working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: make sure the brushes are tighted to the shaft.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sweepers I have ever owned, however the assembler who put this together did not tighten the nuts/bolts that hold the brushes to the shaft and one brush was totally destroyed before I was able to stop it when it came apart and wrapped itself around the shaft. I reused the brushes I salvaged from the unit this one replaced. If I hadn't saved parts from the old unit, I would have been up the creek without a paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Ayhens Sr.

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece of equipment. Easy assembly, strong and well built right down to the sweeper bag. So versatile. Even moving the tongue all the way to one side or the other, it pulls straight and strong enough to stay straight. So Pleased and happy I didn't go with the brand of my tractor. I purchased the king pin also for $15.00 and made my lige easier for sure. .
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Seales

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Gets the leaves well and is solid. Leaves need to be dry. This is not a vacuum so don't think it is going to get everything but for the money it does the job. Moving it around is a pain off the lawn tractor and storing it takes up a lot of room. Taking it apart might be better but I havent tried it I have the room.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Product seems sturdy and I'm excited to get out there and sweep ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took about 2 hours and I am missing a bolt which I will call about tomorrow. I'm unsure as to what the person writing about was talking about taking the whole bag assembly apart, I hope he realizes it was velcro on the bag. Product seems sturdy and I'm excited to get out there and sweep up all I've dethatched. To all the others who have complained about the gear getting chewed up, remember to take it slow.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron N

customer_reviews.title: Great for grass leaves and sticks!
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this to sweep shotgun wads off our range. It did well, plus swept broken clays into the bin. Grass, leaves, And sticks are perfectly picked up! So for yardwork it deserves a 5!! My son’s girlfriend and I (55 year old woman) put it together with a few mishaps! We agreed we could out another together in minutes! Girl-power! I would love of the bristles were more heavy duty! Not sure how long it will hold up, but most people aren’t sweeping acres of shotgun wads, clay, and shells!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a half dozen times now for an acre and a third lot with moderate tree coverage and it has saved me so much time and work it's unbelievable. I should have bought one long ago. This brand seems to be made well so far. I do have some leaves shoot above the basket while sweeping but it's not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: What the heck I tried it our and it is perfect for what I want it for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lawn rake and didn't, apparently, read the description of this item well enough. I was surprised to get a lawn SWEEPER. What the heck I tried it our and it is perfect for what I want it for! Picks up y rows of mowed grass usually in one sweep. I have a pretty steep hill and picks up going down just fine.l We have over two acres and I am sure this will do the trick.Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M. Swails

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy Assembly by Rods and Clips
customer_reviews.text: This is easiest assembly I have ever seen. Only two bolts require a wrench. Device seems a sturdy design. Only complaint is height of brush adjustment is slightly clumsy. Bag emptying rod can't be reached from seat of zero turn mower. A short rope attachment to end of rod could fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Sherrell

customer_reviews.title: Better for leaves only.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3+ acre lawn. Previously owned a 45-0320 w/12 cu ft capacity. It was easy to dump and easier to adjust the brush height. 45-0320 is not engineered correctly. It is hard to adjust the brush height and the large capacity hopper is good only for leaves. When full of green grass it is very difficult to dump. Any time saved raking is lost dumping and emptying the hopper. Stick with the 45-0320 and save yourself close to $100.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less than  three years old and totally rusted
customer_reviews.text: We loved this sweeper when we got it. It was designed very well and did the job nicely. Unfortunately the whole thing was made from poor quality materials and fell apart way too soon. It is not usable at all anymore. We are very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Silke

customer_reviews.title: A great solution for lawn tractor owners who want to pick up leaves and grass
customer_reviews.text: Although, it does require some assembly, no tools are needed as the parts snap together and are held with cotter pins. Does a great job on grass and an OK job on pavement since it sweeps forward and pushes some of the debris along the ground instead of sweeping it into the bag. Once the volume of grass or leaves increases, it becomes more effective. If you don't have a huge area to keep clear, this is the ideal tool to use since the cost is only about $300 compared to well more than a thousand for a pull-behind unit that sucks up leaves and has a separate motor.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGuy69

customer_reviews.title: Sweeper is great. The dumping arm / upper frame bar is too weak.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how sturdy the sweeper base is and how well it worked (the first time I used it). The unit went together very easily and it is nice that it comes apart so easily for storage. The main issue I have is that the top support bar where the dumping arm attaches is super weak. The unit was about 60% full and the bar bent during my 2nd time using it.
customer_reviews.author: AionAegis

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you have a yard with a moderate amount of leaves
customer_reviews.text: First a bought a leaf blower for my yard. It is more useful for grass and getting leaves out of tight spaces. Then this beast sweeps the rest of the yard and cuts time spent gathering leaves by 90%.
customer_reviews.author: Attention to Detail

customer_reviews.title: Why Didn't I Think of This Before?
customer_reviews.text: All these years of raking and bagging leaves on a 100' x 200' lot no more! Now, all I have to do is make a quick run across my yard the same way I cut it and, holy cow, leaves are gone. Just like running a carpet sweeper on a rug. I picked out a small corner at the back of my yard to drop the leaves, then I just rake them into a compost pile. Amazingly, this sweeper picks up gum balls too! Wow! Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Comfort

customer_reviews.title: Don't spend the money
customer_reviews.text: Handle was very clumsy and hard to use...I thought it would be better than actually tipping it up but it isn't. You still have to jump off the mower pull the handle then find a place to lay the handle then pull the mower forward...jump off again and put the bag down . the sweeper does a good job but the bag comes loose in the corners, the handle vibrates loose.... Sad because I thought paying more would mean a good catcher.
customer_reviews.author: sandi

customer_reviews.title: this I love. Some other reviews indicate that the gears for ...
customer_reviews.text: Now, this I love. Some other reviews indicate that the gears for the brushes strip out. If set to just brush the surface of the grass and not try and use it as an dethatcher, it seems to clean well and leave the lawn nice and groomed. Put it on the discharge side of the mower with it offset to the right and blow the clippings back into the un-mowed part of the lawn. If you put it on the already mowed side of the mower, then it tends to pull up some of the grass and makes sticking up parts. I can't wait to see what it does in the fall with the leaves.
customer_reviews.author: mrb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does a great job. I wish I had bought it sooner. I don’t have those unsightly clippings anymore! Easy to dump. A friend and I put it together. (I am a 79 year old female and she is 60. I read the instructions and she did the work,)That was a bit challenging because of the 2dimension instructions. But we did it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice R. Cullinan

customer_reviews.title: The Agri-Fab 45 is 10x better..
customer_reviews.text: I have completed about four lawn-sweeps........the agri-fab 45 is worth every penny so far....it is summer and I have been sweeping grass and there has been a lot of grass.....some grass cuttings you can leave but if its too heavy, it cant be left on the lawn, it will cover the live grass and ruin it.....I previously had to hand rake....took a lot of time and was a back breaker.....The Agri-Fab 45 is 10x better.....Two questions I cant answer right now is 1.) How will it do with leaves ( that's another raking job I have to do )........2. ) Durability - will the Agri-Fab45 last four or five seasons maintenance free..........
customer_reviews.author: BOB4297

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Got most of the acorns and almost all leaves. Highly recommend. Only problem is I could not back out my tractor out of the garage with the sweeper connected. If you have a big yard with trees, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Picks up a lot
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, it works good for picking up leaves, pine needles and pine cones. However, after a while it starts to drag the ground with it eventually ripping. Be sure to keep your receipt and warranty info, you can replace it for free within a year of use which is what we had to do.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Works good, doesn't fold up easily
customer_reviews.text: It functions great if you set to the right height. You can tip the catcher bag up and forward to store it to save some space, but to fold it up you would have to remove the two support bars which is not real convenient. I didn't have a problem putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Put together in about 2 hours. It works well. One thing I would change would be the velcro around the poles to hold it. I would rather have ties.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Works well on Grass Clippings and Leaves
customer_reviews.text: Like this product and saves a lot of work. Would purchase again. The dethatcher that comes as an option is not great, but does lift some thatch and dead leaves from over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: DJ E.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t cringe at the falling leaves this year.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put it together in about an hour. Only had to call the company once for help. The help center answered quickly and solved our problem on the first try. It does a good on leaves but I haven’t tried it on pine straw.
customer_reviews.author: BB

product_meta.title: Agri-Fab 45-0492 Lawn Sweeper, 44-Inch
product_meta.description: The new for 2013 Agri-Fab 44" lawn sweeper raises the performance bar from the already high level set by our previous model. Starting with the simplified , "no tool" adjustment and storage breakdown to the new "flow thru" hopper this sweeper is all about saving time, effort and making lawn care easy.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Agri-Fab 44-Inch Lawn Sweeper, 45-0492 model

Lawn Sweeper dimensions: 78” L x 55” W x 52” H | Carton Dimensions: 54.1” L x 18” W x 19.5” H | Brush to Wheel ratio: 5.6:1 | Hooper Capacity: 25 Cu. Ft. | Wheel dimensions: 12” x 3” | Wheel type: Semi-pneumatic | Pallet Qty.: 8 | Weight: 95 lbs
Height adjustment lever with easy to use indicator will never slip and assures optimum performance
Improved dump lever can operate without leaving the tractor seat. Entire sweeper folds up without tools saving on storage space
Brushes should only move during forward rotation. If brushes rotate in both directions, means that the drive pin is jamming the ratchet gear. Disassemble and make sure drive Pin moves freely

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars969 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
